event.title: South West Ruby #12 : Ruby Christmas
event.description:
Join us at Cookpad HQ in Bristol, this month for more great talks. Expect another Ruby packed evening with great conversations, beers and bites to eat.

Schedule

18:30 - 19:00 - Arrive, grab a drink, some delicious locally supplied food and have a chat with fellow attendees.

19:00-20:00 Talks

Chris Seaton - "Ruby Metaprogramming Doesnâ€™t Have To Be Slow" @ChrisGSeaton

David Stosik - "Monkey Patching Wisely" @davidstosik

20:00-20:30 - Socialise and network.

Slack

If you like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel
